messageInterval.title: Interval between messages publication
messageInterval.description: Interval between messages publication, in milliseconds.

messageContent.title: Content of published messages
messageContent.description: Content of published messages. Will be suffixed with message index.

messageCount.title: Count of published messages
messageCount.description: Count of published messages. If not specified, there is no limit.

populateMetadata.title: Populate Metadata
populateMetadata.description: Copy message content into a metadata entry. The entry key will be 'mock-metadata'.

populateHeaders.title: Populate Headers
populateHeaders.description: Copy message content into a header. The header name will be 'X-Mock-Header'.
